name: DailyQuestion
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily question
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Daily Question is brought to you by the TV Guide team. We present a daily poll on the big topic of the day, express your opinions and see what the nation thinks. We have a new question each day.

Tips
- Just say Option one or Option two to make your choice
- Wait for the blue light before giving your answer

Got feedback? Send us a note: contact@tvguide.co.uk
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
